52 week low

Source: R/nse-stock.R
nse_stock_year_low.Rd

Fetch stocks that have touched their 52 week lows during the day on NSE.

nse_stock_year_low()

Value

A tibble with the following column names:

symbol

NSE ticker.

symbol_desc

Name of the firm.

date

Previous low date.

new_low

New 52 week low price.

year

Year.

last_traded_price

Last traded price.

prev_low

Previous low price.

prev_close

Previous close price.

change

Change in price.

percent_change

Percentage change in price.

Examples

# \donttest{
nse_stock_year_low()
#> # A tibble: 54 x 10
#>    symbol symbol_desc date       new_high   year last_traded_pri~ prev_high
#>    <chr>  <chr>       <date>        <dbl>  <dbl>            <dbl>     <dbl>
#>  1 AGRIT~ Agri-Tech ~ 2019-11-21    41.0   41.0             44.0      41.0 
#>  2 AIFL   Ashapura I~ 2019-11-25     1.55   1.55             1.55      1.6 
#>  3 ARIHA~ Arihant Su~ 2019-10-17    22.8   22.8             24.0      22.8 
#>  4 ASHIA~ Ashiana Ho~ 2019-11-28    87.6   87.6             88.7      91.2 
#>  5 BHAGE~ Bhageria I~ 2019-11-26    95     95               96        95.2 
#>  6 BLUEC~ Blue Chip ~ 2019-11-04     0.3    0.3              0.3       0.35
#>  7 BODAL~ Bodal Chem~ 2019-11-22    63.8   63.8             64.3      64.0 
#>  8 CHENN~ Chennai Pe~ 2019-11-29   120.   120.             123.      125   
#>  9 DECCA~ Deccan Cem~ 2019-11-29   298.   298.             301.      299.  
#> 10 DOLLAR Dollar Ind~ 2019-11-29   140.   140.             141.      140   
#> # ... with 44 more rows, and 3 more variables: prev_close <dbl>, change <dbl>,
#> #   percent_change <dbl>
# }
